page.title: 18Religion
page.content: Anglican servics are held every Sunday 0930 at Alwinton and 1100 at Holystone. Every month th vicar takes a Service at Alnham Church.During the Summer months there are joint Anglican/United Reform Church Services. The Vicar is Rev. John Wylam. His Church Wardens are Mr. Harold Hedley of Windyhaugh and Dr. Roger Williams of Harbottle,our General Practitioner. Mrs. Pat Hedley is the Organist. There is a small childrens choir on Sundays.For special occasions and choir festivals in the Diocese a full choir is organised. Their main event is the Christmas Carol Service.
